rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports on smaller outbreaks, lacking vivid language.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports outbreaks but lacks explicit calming language or reassurance.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports a fact (outbreaks reported) but does not describe capabilities or preparedness.
The segment reports the location of outbreaks, not prices or economic metrics.
The segment reports past events, not speculation about future relief or improvement.
No direct quote or attributed statement present.
Factual description of scale, not explicit minimization; defaults to Neutral.
